rows.translation: Perdition overtake both hands of Abu Lahab, and he will perish.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.arabic: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
rows.translation: His wealth and what he earns will not avail him.
rows.transliteration: mā aghnā `anhu māluhu wa mā kasab

rows.translation: He shall soon burn in fire that flames,
And his wife, the bearer of fuel,
Upon her neck a halter of strongly twisted rope.
